content: middle of heel round 2 n2 is knit and n1 is knit in pattern repeat these two gusset decrease rounds until you have reached your original stitch count 60 72 stitches 30 36 stitches on n1 & n2 foot continue knitting the foot as follows abbreviations n1 is in pattern and n2 which is the sole of the foot is knit plain knitting ssk slip slip knit the foot until it measures approx 1 5 to 2 less than the your foot length k2tog knit 2 together when i try on my sock i knit until i have reached the bottom of my big toe p2tog purl 2 together and then begin my toe decreases k knit toe p purl round 1 on n2 knit to last 3 k2tog co cast on k1 on n1 k1 ssk knit across to last 3 k2tog k1 on n2 k1 ssk knit to n needle middle of n2 one round is complete sl -­ slip round 2 knit repeat repeat repeat these 2 rounds until you have 10 12 stitches left on each needle cont continue graft these stitches together block rs right side socks as desired ws wrong side grab your pumpkin spice latte and enjoy your new socks medium the charts are read from bottom up and right to left repeat each row twice the even row are all plain knit large
